history.content:
This problem is found in [1].

  • Suppose I am on a low-memory x86 system (<4MB). I don’t care about swapping or addressing more than 4MB.
  • How can I keep paging space overhead at one page?

Note that you should not rely on the PS bit if you know what PS bit is.

There is a solution sketch in [1] for your reference.

Reference:

[1] http://www3.cs.stonybrook.edu/~porter/courses/cse506/f11/slides/x86-paging.pdf
history.subject: Microsoft Interview Question (yet another question on paging)

history.content:
This problem is found in [1].

  • Suppose I am on a low-memory x86 system (<4MB). I don’t care about swapping or addressing more than 4MB.
  • How can I keep paging space overhead at one page?

Note that you should not rely on the PS bit if you know what PS bit is.

Reference:

[1] http://www3.cs.stonybrook.edu/~porter/courses/cse506/f11/slides/x86-paging.pdf
history.subject: Microsoft Interview Question (yet another question on paging)

children.subject:
我的理解是：
         专门用一页来存放一级页表。让一页大小是4KB，页表项大小是4B。一页能存1K页表项，可以表示的总内存空间是1K*4KB=4MB。一页全部存页表正好可以表示4MB的内存空间，分页开销就正好在一页了。

这道题不仅要求说明分页开销只有一页时可以容纳4MB的空间，还进一步要求给出具体的实现方案。例如，假设物理地址空间中，可用内存为0x100000到0x500000（即1M到5M，共4M可用内存），要求这些内存在虚拟地址空间中也是连续的，那么：

  1. 用作页表的4K内存的物理地址是？虚拟地址是？
  2. 可用内存在虚拟地址空间中的范围是？

答案不唯一，只要合理即可。
不用再提示了。有心的同学提前做好准备吧。
